snippet: New rules passed under the Dodd Frank Act are giving outsiders a peek into the murky world of hedge funds, but the billionaire investor John Paulson is being more guarded with his disclosures.
abstract: New rules passed under the Dodd Frank Act are giving outsiders a peek into the murky world of hedge funds, but the billionaire investor John Paulson is being more guarded with his disclosures.

headline.main: New Regulatory Filings Offer Limited Glimpse Into Paulson's Funds
